title: Yara Escape
description: Discover the beauty of Gangtok with our 3-day comprehensive tour package.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Arrive in Gangtok, check-in to hotel, visit local attractions like MG Road and Flower Show.

itinerary.title: Tsomgo Lake & Baba Mandir
itinerary.description: Full day excursion to the stunning Tsomgo Lake and sacred Baba Mandir.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit local markets for souvenir shopping before departure.

title: North Sikkim Adventure
description: Experience the majestic landscapes of North Sikkim in this thrilling 5-day adventure.

itinerary.title: Gangtok Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive in Gangtok and prepare for the adventure ahead.

itinerary.title: Gangtok to Lachen
itinerary.description: Travel to Lachen, visiting Chungthang and Seven Sisters Waterfall en route.

itinerary.title: Gurudongmar Lake Excursion
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to the breathtaking Gurudongmar Lake.

itinerary.title: Lachen to Lachung
itinerary.description: Transfer to Lachung, known for its beautiful valleys and waterfalls.

itinerary.title: Yumthang Valley & Return
itinerary.description: Visit the stunning Yumthang Valley before returning to Gangtok.

title: Test Package - Darjeeling Explorer
description: Explore the beautiful tea gardens and mountain views of Darjeeling in this exciting 4-day package.
about: Experience the best of Darjeeling with our carefully curated package. Visit the famous tea gardens, watch the sunrise from Tiger Hill, and enjoy the mountain views.
termsAndConditions: Cancellation: No refund within 7 days of travel
ID proof required for all travelers

itinerary.title: Arrival in Darjeeling
itinerary.description: Pickup from NJP Railway Station/Bagdogra Airport. Drive to Darjeeling (2-3 hours). Check-in to hotel. Evening free for local exploration. Overnight stay in Darjeeling.

itinerary.title: Tiger Hill Sunrise & Darjeeling Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Early morning visit to Tiger Hill for sunrise over Kanchenjunga (weather permitting). After breakfast, visit Himalayan Mountaineering Institute, Padmaja Naidu Himalayan Zoological Park, Tibetan Refugee Self Help Center, and Tea Garden. Overnight stay in Darjeeling.

itinerary.title: Darjeeling Local Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit Batasia Loop, Ghoom Monastery, Japanese Temple, and Peace Pagoda. Enjoy a ride on the famous Darjeeling Toy Train (subject to availability). Evening free for shopping at Mall Road. Overnight stay in Darjeeling.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check-out from hotel. Transfer to NJP Railway Station/Bagdogra Airport for your onward journey.
